meanings.sent1: The oversewed fabric was very strong.
meanings.sent2: She wore an oversewed dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The oversewed pillow looked like a patchwork quilt.
meanings.sent4: The oversewed seams held the garment together securely.
meanings.sent5: The oversewed pattern created a unique texture.

meanings.definition: To sew with stitches that overlap.
meanings.sent1: She oversewed the torn shirt back together.
meanings.sent2: He oversewed the buttons onto the coat.
meanings.sent3: The tailor oversewed the hem in a zigzag pattern.
meanings.sent4: The artist oversewed the patches into a beautiful design.
meanings.sent5: They oversewed the patches to prevent fraying.
